name: 2022 7th International Conference on Marketing, Business and Trade
content: Publication Informationï¼š Submissions will be reviewed by the conference committees and accepted papers will be published in the following journals: 1\. International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance(IJTEF) ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) Frequency: Bimonthly DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF Abstracting/Indexing: ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, EBSCO, etc. 2\. Journal of Economics, Business and Management (JOEBM) ISSN: 2301-3567 Frequency: Quarterly DOI: 10.18178/JOEBM Abstracting/Indexing: Electronic Journals Library, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, MESLibrary, Google Scholar, and Crossref.
